parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of resources to return per page. Acceptable range is [1-100]. Default value is 100.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma-separated list of fields to include by dot notation. Wildcards are supported. If unset, all fields are included.

get.summary: Get top 5 relevant resources by search criteria
get.description: Returns top 5 relevant resources by search criteria

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query. Mappings are identical to resource searching.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of each resource to return. Acceptable range is [1-5]. Default value is 5.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma-separated list of resources to include: anime, artists, entries, series, songs, synonyms, themes, videos.

get.summary: Get paginated listing of Videos by search criteria
get.description: Returns listing of Videos by search criteria

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query. Mapping is to video.filename or video.tags[] or [video.entries.theme.anime.name|video.entries.theme.anime.synonyms.text + video.entries.theme.slug + video.entries.version] or video.entries.theme.song.title.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of resources to return per page. Acceptable range is [1-100]. Default value is 100.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma-separated list of fields to include by dot notation. Wildcards are supported. If unset, all fields are included.

name.description: The Primary Title of the Anime

year.description: The Year in which the Anime Premiered

season.description: The Season in which the Anime Premiered

text.description: For alternative titles, licensed titles, common abbreviations and/or shortenings

type.description: Is this an OP or an ED?

group.description: For separating sequences belonging to dubs, rebroadcasts, remasters, etc

name.description: The Primary Name of the Artist

as.description: Used in place of the Artist name if the performance is made as a character or group/unit member

version.description: The Version number of the Theme

episodes.description: The range(s) of episodes that the theme entry is used

nsfw.description: Does the entry include Not Safe For Work content?

spoiler.description: Does the entry include content that spoils the show?

notes.description: Any additional information not included in other fields that may be useful

path.description: The path of the Video in storage

subbed.description: Does the video include subtitles of dialogue?

lyrics.description: Does the video include subtitles for song lyrics?

uncen.description: Is the video an uncensored version of a censored sequence?

source.description: Where did this video come from?

overlap.description: The degree to which the sequence and episode content overlap

link.description: The link to the video stream

label.description: Used to distinguish resources that map to the same artist or anime
